    • Method Detail

      • validate

        public boolean validate​(java.lang.String username,
                        java.lang.String password)
                 throws NullInputException,
                        InvalidDataException,
                        DoesNotExistException
        Checks the provided password to see if it matches the one stored in the database.
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user to check the password of
        password - the entered password to check if its in the database
        Returns:
        Boolean value representing if the entered password matches the value in the databse
        Throws:
        NullInputException - an input was null when it should not have been
        InvalidDataException - invalid data was provided to the function
        DoesNotExistException - the user does not exists
